meanings.sent1: From the hotel balcony, the oceanview was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The house's best feature was the stunning oceanview.
meanings.sent3: The oceanview seemed to wink at the sun every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an oceanview of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The oceanview stretched out like a painting before them.

meanings.definition: A room or property with a view of the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The resort offered luxurious oceanview rooms.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent emphasized the value of the oceanview property.
meanings.sent3: The oceanview room felt like a private paradise.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an oceanview of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The oceanview property was a dream come true for the couple.
